page.title: 03Secondary Education in Stone
page.content: Alleyne's School is 427 years old. The Rev.Thomas Alleyne founded the school in 1558.The School motto is "Nisi Dominus Frustra" which means "Unless the Lord in Vain". The school was rebuilt in 1888 for the fourth time.There were additions to the building in 1951, 1962 and 1970.The Theatre can seat up to 200 people.All the 3rd year pupils can not fit into the theatre because there are only 200 seats.The computer room can hold 30 pupils and there are 17 computers.The school has a playing field, sports centre, squash courts, tennis courts and a swimming pool.The school crest is the same as the crest of the Whitehouse family and George Washington's family.The pupils come from middle schools at 13 and stay until they are 16 or 18.
